value.info_text:
Condensate hot steam around your foes in radius 1, 2, 2, 3, 3, burning them for 206, 279, 336, 384, 426 fire damage and applying the wet effect for 4 turns, halving their stun resistances.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower.
value.name: Condensate

value2.info_text:
Condensate hot steam around your foes in radius 1, 2, 2, 3, 3, burning them for 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 fire damage and applying the wet effect for 4 turns, halving their stun resistances.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Condensate

value.info_text:
Your yeti's body is very resilient to detrimental effects.

Each time you are hit by a physical, magical, or mental detrimental effect your body reacts with a burst of healing.

This effect heals for 46, 64, 74, 80, 85 and can only occur up to 3 times per turn.

It increases with your Constitution stat.
value.name: Resilient Body

value2.info_text:
Your yeti's body is very resilient to detrimental effects.

Each time you are hit by a physical, magical, or mental detrimental effect your body reacts with a burst of healing.

This effect heals for 51, 75, 85, 90, 94 and can only occur up to 3 times per turn.

It increases with your Constitution stat.
value2.name: Resilient Body

value.info_text:
You revel in death, devouring the souls of your victims. Whenever you inflict damage to a target, you deal an additional 12, 17, 20, 23, 26 darkness damage.

Additionally, you gain 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 souls whenever you score a kill.

The damage will scale with the highest of your spell or mind power and can only occur up to 15 times per turn.
value.name: Raze

value2.info_text:
You revel in death, devouring the souls of your victims. Whenever you inflict damage to a target, you deal an additional 16, 21, 25, 29, 32 darkness damage.

Additionally, you gain 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 souls whenever you score a kill.

The damage will scale with the highest of your spell or mind power.
value2.name: Raze

value.info_text:
You tessellate your cloak with small pieces of metal, providing 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 damage reduction against all attacks.

The myriad metal scraps also help against incoming projectiles, providing a 35%, 44%, 51%, 57%, 62% chance of deflecting them to a nearby spot.
value.name: Automated Cloak Tessellation

value2.info_text:
You tessellate your cloak with small pieces of metal, providing 31, 43, 52, 59, 66 damage reduction against all attacks.

The myriad metal scraps also help against incoming projectiles, providing a 35%, 44%, 51%, 57%, 62% chance of deflecting them to a nearby spot.
value2.name: Automated Cloak Tessellation

value.info_text:
Firmly plant your steamsaws in the ground, using them to propel yourself very quickly (+320%, +398%, +459%, +510%, +556% movement speed).

Any foes on either side of your movement get wrecked by the saws, knocking them 3 tiles away from you.

Attacking or using any talent will break this effect.

When this effect is broken or cancelled the sudden change in motion deals 150%, 172%, 188%, 201%, 214% weapon damage to all foes around you. To do full damage you need to have moved at least 5 times, otherwise damage is lower (or null for no movement).

The wheels of death! Amazing!
value.name: Saw Wheels

value2.info_text:
Firmly plant your steamsaws in the ground, using them to propel yourself very quickly (+320%, +398%, +459%, +510%, +556% movement speed).

Any foes on either side of your movement get wrecked by the saws, knocking them 3 tiles away from you.

Attacking or using any talent will break this effect.

When this effect is broken or cancelled the sudden change in motion deals 150%, 172%, 188%, 201%, 214% weapon damage to all foes around you.

The wheels of death! Amazing!
value2.name: Saw Wheels

value.info_text:
You have lived through many battles, and your experience makes you a gritty veteran.

Saw Wheels end of effect attack increased by 12%, 19%, 25%, 30%, 35%.

Grinding Shield lets you live below your normal limits, up to -81, -154, -209, -256, -298 life.

Punishment has a 36%, 57%, 73%, 86%, 98% chance to have its cooldown reduced by 1 for each effect.

Domination for all!
value.name: Battlefield Veteran

value2.info_text:
You have lived through many battles, and your experience makes you a gritty veteran.

Saw Wheels end of effect attack increased by 17%, 44%, 65%, 82%, 97%.

Grinding Shield lets you live below your normal limits, up to -81, -154, -209, -256, -298 life.

Punishment has a 36%, 57%, 73%, 86%, 98% chance to have its cooldown reduced by 1 for each effect.

Domination for all!
value2.name: Battlefield Veteran

value.info_text:
Place an electrically charged sentry device at a location.

Every turn it will fire a bolt of electricity at a nearby enemy.

The bolts do 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 lightning damage.

The sentry has 720, 976, 1174, 1342, 1491 life and lasts 10 turns.

Damage, life, resists, and armor scale with your Steampower.

Damage and penetration are inherited from the creator.
value.name: Voltaic Sentry

value2.info_text:
Place an electrically charged sentry device at a location.

Every turn it will fire a bolt of electricity at a nearby enemy.

The bolts do 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 lightning damage.

The sentry has 720, 976, 1174, 1342, 1491 life and lasts 8 turns.

Damage, life, resists, and armor scale with your Steampower.

Damage and penetration are inherited from the creator.
value2.name: Voltaic Sentry

value.info_text:
Using psionic energies you overheat your shot, making it deal 141%, 166%, 185%, 202%, 216% damage.

If the shot hits a wet foe it will vaporize, removing the wet effect and dealing 278, 376, 453, 518, 575 fire damage in a radius 4.
value.name: Boiling Shot

value2.info_text:
Using psionic energies you overheat your shot, making it deal 141%, 166%, 185%, 202%, 216% damage.

If the shot hits a wet foe it will vaporize, removing the wet effect and dealing 278, 376, 453, 518, 575 fire damage in a radius 4.
value2.name: Boiling Shot

value.info_text:
Using psionic energies you temporarily alter your blood, turning it into molten iron.

When affected by molten blood all creatures that hit you in melee take 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 fire damage, all your resistances are increased by 6%, 13%, 17%, 20%, 22% and all new detrimental effects on you have their duration reduced by 8%, 17%, 22%, 25%, 27%.

Damage increases with your Steampower.
value.name: Molten Iron Blood

value2.info_text:
Using psionic energies you temporarily alter your blood, turning it into molten iron.

When affected by molten blood all creatures that hit you in melee take 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 fire damage, all your resistances are increased by 8%, 17%, 22%, 25%, 27% and all new detrimental effects on you have their duration reduced by 8%, 17%, 22%, 25%, 27%.

Damage increases with your Steampower.
value2.name: Molten Iron Blood

value.info_text:
Hits the target with your weapon, doing 115%, 130%, 141%, 151%, 159% damage. If the attack hits, the target's armour and saves are reduced by 6, 13, 20, 25, 31 for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns.

Also if the target is protected by a temporary damage shield there is 34%, 70%, 80%, 85%, 88% chance to shatter it.

Armor reduction chance increases with your Physical Power.
value.name: Shattering Blow

value2.info_text:
Hits the target with your weapon, doing 110%, 123%, 132%, 141%, 148% damage. If the attack hits, the target's armour and saves are reduced by 6, 13, 20, 25, 31 for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns.

Also if the target is protected by a temporary damage shield there is 34%, 70%, 80%, 85%, 88% chance to shatter it.

Armor reduction chance increases with your Physical Power.
value2.name: Shattering Blow

value.info_text: When you deal a critical hit your embedded system activates, increasing all your primary stats except Strength by 50% of your Strength for 6 turn.
value.name: Pain Enhancement System
require: Level 30, Str 50; Earned the achievement 'Size Matters' on this character.

value2.info_text: When you deal a critical hit your embedded system activates, increasing all your primary stats except Strength by 50% of your Strength for 6 turn.
value2.name: Pain Enhancement System
require: Level 30, Str 50; Earned the achievement 'Size Is Everything' on this character.
